artist: Artist: Henri Joseph Hesse; Publisher: Rudolph Ackermann
description: half length portrait of the artist facing right, looking back left; wearing large, soft cap; right hand on table, left arm bent at elbow and braced on table
inscription:

in plate in black: Hesse / PARMEGIANO/ FROM THE PICTURE IN THE FLORENCE GALLERY / London: Published Jan\'y 1, 1827, by R. Ackermann, 96 Strand / Printed by Engelmann & Co. | on sheet in pencil: 2-163
title: Portrait of Parmegiano
